full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 153 of 228 829 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct us, please? 1 Q. Check the fence for holes where Max can get out. 2 A. 3 Q. Who is Max? 4 A. Max was this little dog that Ms. Maxwell owned. Her name was Max. It was a little Yorkie. 5 6 Q. When do you remember first seeing Max? 7 A. I remember seeing Max probably when she came the first time, but I'm not sure. 8 9 Q. When who came the first time? 10 A. Ms. Maxwell came to Palm Beach. 11 Q. Remind us about what year that was. 12 A. '91. 13 Q. 1991? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. Did Ms. Maxwell still have this dog Max when you left Mr. Epstein's employment in 2002? 16 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. Do you know whether Max traveled with Ms. Maxwell or stayed in Palm Beach? 19 20 A. No, she traveled with Ms. Maxwell all the time. 21 Q. How do you know that? 22 A. Because I took Max, she had to have a bath before she leave, and every time they -- there was wheels up, the poor dog shake like crazy because she didn't like to be in the plane. 23 24 25 Q. Let's turn now, please, to page 23. I'd like to look at SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012438
